bestIdea.name: Journey Through the Crystal Caves of Aglarond
bestIdea.description: Explore the legendary Crystal Caves of Aglarond, a vast underground network of glittering caverns from the world of Middle-earth. These caves are renowned for their breathtaking beauty, with walls encrusted with shimmering crystals and luminescent pools.

otherIdeas.name: The Crystal Caves of Bermuda
otherIdeas.description: Discover the real-world Crystal Caves of Bermuda, a stunning natural wonder filled with stalactites, stalagmites, and crystal-clear underground pools. This journey takes you through a series of breathtaking caverns, each more beautiful than the last.

otherIdeas.name: The Crystal Caves of Naica
otherIdeas.description: Venture into the Crystal Caves of Naica in Mexico, home to some of the largest natural crystals ever discovered. This journey takes you through a surreal landscape of massive selenite crystals, creating an otherworldly experience.
